original_text: These discovered her nakedness: they took her sons and her daughters, and slew her with the sword: and she became famous among women; for they had executed judgment upon her.
korean_text: 그들이 그의 하체를 드러내고 그의 자녀를 빼앗으며 칼로 그를 죽여 여인들에게 이야깃거리가 되게 하였나니 이는 그들이 그에게 심판을 행함이니라

sentences.original_text: they took her sons and her daughters
and slew her with the sword
and she became famous among women
for they had executed judgment upon her
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그들이 그녀에게 심판을 실행했기 때문이다
